video.title: Shameless
video.synopsis: Unemployed Frank Gallagher -- a single father of eight kids -- attempts to keep sane, often with a little help from a bottle.

episodes.synopsis: Having her handbag stolen proves to be a blessing in disguise for Fiona when handsome stranger Steve comes to her rescue.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: After a fight with Steve, Frank disappears and fails to return to collect his Giro. The Gallaghers panic when a body is discovered in a nearby river.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Mentioning wedding plans to discourage an amorous female customer, barman Kev is overheard by Frank -- who tells everyone in the pub.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: When a small child goes missing from a children's party on the Chatsworth estate, Frank turns the crowd into a lynch mob.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Frank and Karen hit the road for their driving lesson, but Karen adds some extracurricular maneuvers to the timetable.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Frank stuns the family by turning up in the morning to get his post when it's not even Giro day.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Things are not looking good for Frank. The housing office is on to him, his debts are piling up and the bailiffs are still on the doorstep.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Christmas Special: The Gallagher family get merry.
episodes.title: Christmas Special

episodes.synopsis: Frank's dad, Neville, turns up at Sheila's to see his new grandchildren -- the latest additions to the Gallagher clan.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Everyone's partying at Kev and Veronica's when Frank takes a call. Hours later, he remembers to mention that social services are on their way.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Things liven up on the estate when the council run a Best Kept Garden competition to win a year's free rent.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Wedding preparations are under way for the impending nuptials of Fiona and Steve. But when Steve's car goes missing, he's desperate to get it back.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: When Sheila asks Lip to water the plants for a neighbor who's away, he finds a haven of tranquility. But when the place is burgled, Lip gets blamed.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Mandy is pretending to be Ian's girlfriend to hide the fact that he's gay. But when she gets pregnant, the Maguires threaten him with castration.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: It's Ladies' Night at the Jockey and Fiona thinks she's copped off with footballer Ryan, but wakes up next to the far less desirable Joey Dawson.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Frank falls foul of two shifty accident claims salesmen after being hit in the mouth by the door at Kash's shop.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Debbie's on a mission to help Marty, who has an impending court appearance for a breach of the peace. Meanwhile, Fiona suffers from morning sickness.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: It's the local elections, and Kash is running for Chatsworth's Councillor against dirty dealing Bernie Creme.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Five-year-old Liam denounces religion at his RC Primary School and risks a home visit by his teacher and therefore, social services.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Lip finds a new friend when he starts as a porter at a hotel, but he turns out to be decidedly dodgy.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: After being knocked to the ground during a purse robbery at the shop, a heavily pregnant Mandy Maguire gives birth to Lip's daughter.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: When Carol learns that her best friend Lillian had an affair with her husband back in the 1970s, she gets revenge by reporting Lillian to the DSS.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Kev is stricken with shock and grief when on his 35th birthday, his mother throws herself from her balcony.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: The Gallagher clan can't believe it when Carl starts to bring money into the household. But his enterprise soon attracts the attention of the police.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: When Debbie makes friends with a popular girl her own age, she realizes what she's been missing out on and goes on strike.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Frank and Sheila's wedding day looms, but there's a surprise in store for Frank when Sheila reveals what really happened to her ex-husband Sheldon.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: When the kids' long-lost mother, Monica, turns up at Lip's party, she threatens to turn their world upside down.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: There's a new Maguire in town. Jamie's out after a 10 stretch, but what does he want with the Jockey?
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Monica's got her claws into Frank, but dare he tell Sheila he's slept with his ex?
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: When Ian gets caught up with someone on the run, he's initially reluctant to help.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: When Monica becomes jealous of the attention Debbie's getting from Frank, she tells her it's time she got a boyfriend.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Carl wants his family back together, and that means getting rid of Norma -- for good.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Explosions across the estate spark fears that Chatsworth is a terrorist target.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Learning of the death of his three ex-cell mates is sending Paddy round the bend.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Frank's in the hospital after an unfortunate accident and he's told that tests show he has a heart condition and may not make it to the weekend.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Mimi has to face up to her darkest personal issue: years of seemingly irreversible weight gain.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: When Monica starts getting visions of nursery rhyme characters, she knows exactly what's going on: she's going to have another baby!
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Frank Gallagher has won the lottery -- or so the residents of Chatsworth believe when Yvonne announces it on the local news.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Shane falls for his perfect woman, and it looks like she's fallen for him, but when she takes him back to her place he's in for a bit of a surprise.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Micky's attempts to get into his dad's good books go horribly wrong when he loses the weekly drug pick up. He enlists Ian's help in getting them back.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: A gas leak brings sexy fireman Sean to Ian and Mandy's attention. The two soon get competitive as to who'll get to bed him and a wager is made.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: On a bus, Frank has a brief encounter with a beautiful stranger, Rosie. His head is turned and he finds himself with a spring in his step.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Monica gets an unexpected guest -- it's her mother Joan, who nobody's seen for 20 years. Suddenly, Monica's childhood insecurities come flooding back.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Jamie's ex-cell mate Mark comes to stay but Karen doesn't trust him and the battle lines are drawn.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: When Paddy's caught for an armed robbery and could face 20 years inside, Mimi begs him to call his brother, Noel. He's the only one who can help.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: When Stan gets caught in the crossfire between Yvonne and her kids, a full-blown row puts their relationship on the rocks.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Mandy looks set for an upturn in her love life when she's persuaded into going on a blind date by Karen, Jamie and Ian.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: After Mandy gets arrested for suspected drug running she forms the most unlikely of friendships and helps Tom search for his real mother.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: While having another secret rendezvous, Debbie and Tom suddenly have to come to the aid of an assaulted woman, but things go horribly wrong.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: When Manchester experiences an earth tremor, Monica goes into labor. On the other side of Chatsworth, the same tremor knocks Frank into a coma.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: After an attack, Ian is hospitalised with amnesia. Now he's an alien amongst his own family and friends, and even his own sexuality is a mystery.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: With the launch night of the newly redecorated Jockey looming, Jamie and Karen are feeling the pressure in their relationship.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Frank is shocked to discover he's been a victim of identity fraud and even more horrified that, as a result, he's eligible for jury service.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Monica is feeling neglected when her sexual advances are rejected by Frank, and she's determined to get her groove back.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Karen and Jamie's relationship is rocked when Karen has a miscarriage. Both unaware of the pregnancy, they try to come to terms with what's happened.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Disoriented and chained to a bed in a strange room, Paddy wakes to discover he can't remember where he is or how he got there.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Ian returns from his travels, unaware that the car he's driving back to England harbours a secret cargo.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Paddy is back. Desperate to conceal the truth of his whereabouts, he spins Mimi a lie, but he has vengeance on his mind.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Battle lines are drawn between Mimi and Kelly as they go to war over who will help aid Shane's recovery -- with Shane trapped in the cross fire.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: The Gallaghers receive a letter from Liam's school summoning both his parents to the head teacher.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: When Jamie finds out Joe has been battering Mandy, he puts Joe in hospital. Because of Jamie's prior conviction, Mimi takes the rap for her son.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Ian becomes angry with Liam when he discovers that he has been skipping school. He soon finds out that Danny is responsible for Liam's absences.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: The Gallagher unit is rocked when an unexpected visit from the social services catches them off guard.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Yvonne gets a shock when she is confronted by a ghost from her past, and the consequences aren't worth thinking about.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Cast out for the night by Debbie, Frank seeks shelter in a confessional booth, where he overhears a neighbour's shocking confession.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: The Chatsworth residents have survived benefit fraud, brothels, stints in jail, lesbian romps and a family torn apart. What else could go wrong?
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: It's Frank's 50th and Liam has the dubious honour of sharing the auspicious day with him on his 11th birthday.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The Maguire clan is fully mobilised for the christening of its newest member, baby Connor, with Mimi pulling all the strings.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Karen's obsessive drive to prove herself more than just a mum has Jamie worried.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Mimi gets a toy boy, but her happiness is short-lived when she discovers that her new beau is not the man she thought he was.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Maxine is desperate to make a good impression at her parents' party, so she cajoles Ian into pretending to be her boyfriend.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Mimi forces Paddy to guarantee the financial security of the family with one last job -- targeting the drug money of a notorious psychopath.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Frank's romantic interest returns, and her time away has only increased her ardour.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Wedding bells are in the air on the estate -- a little too frequently for the police, for the Maguires are exploiting a new money-making scheme.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Carl and Chesney's attempt to outrun their troubles make them realise the grass isn't always greener.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Shane is devastated to discover he's "firing blanks," and while he frets, Kelly is reconciled to their future without children.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Lonely without his sister and fed up with Libby's well-intentioned interference at home, Liam finds solace in his friendship with an old war veteran.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: In an attempt to build up some confidence, Ian joins the local boxing club and quickly strikes up a friendship with the owner, Jock.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Kelly takes guardianship of her 15-year-old half sister Tonya, who is homeless and needs help to get her baby boy out of care.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: After months of separation, Patrick and Mimi amicably agree to a divorce, but they get a nasty shock when they learn their marriage was never legal.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: When Joe's father dies, the painful realisation that life is too short fuels his determination to start a new life with Karen.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Karen and Joe are holed up in the shop with the spectre of Jamie's revenge hanging over them.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Everyone is talking about Libby and Frank's upcoming wedding. But the Gallaghers' joy is cut short when sad news about a family member reaches them.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: With Frank still missing, Monica wreaks further havoc by demanding custody of Stella and Liam, making it imperative that Frank be found.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: With no sign of Frank, Libby tries to move on by revamping the kitchen and her image. Later, stag night footage of Frank shocks her back to reality.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Karen and Connor return, hoping to start anew. But the past hasn't been forgotten: An angry crowd is waiting.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: After weeks of suffering from mental incarceration, Frank, nearly in full possession of his marbles, plans his escape from the psychiatric hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Carl's 21st birthday is on the horizon, and in an attempt to raise funds for a celebration he'll never forget, he sets up a valet service.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: When Kelly and Shane start a business that satisfies clients' sexual flights of fancy, a kidnapping fantasy goes awry and attracts police attention.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Struggling to work for the family and care for baby Cilla, Micky comes up with a new way of making money: a fake child pornography site.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: With Mimi suffering from insomnia, her real life and dreams begin to merge -- and soon her reality is governed by paranoia and ghosts.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Micky pines for somebody to love and an opportunistic adoption of a cat becomes the perfect outlet for Micky's paternal urges.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Kelly is shocked and outraged to learn that Bonnie is her new boss. Lillian confirms that she's handed over her business to Bonnie after adopting her.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Mimi is surprised when her brother Bobbi shows up and announces that he's soon to become Mimi's sister!
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: A charity night ends in disaster when Shane steals the special guest's wheelchair, causing a public flap and throwing the family business into chaos.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: It's a black day as Paddy Maguire returns in a coffin. While residents grieve, Jamie gathers the Maguires to lift the lid on this "special delivery."
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Avril is busy keeping secrets from her family; with no job and no money, but always a gift to hand, something doesn't quite add up.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Jackson spots Letitia kissing Dee and goes berserk, attacking Dee in front of a social worker who's waiting to assess him and Avril as foster parents.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: A gang rolls into town on a mission to save the souls of the community. But their leader knows too much about certain residents; who's his informant?
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: In the landmark 100th episode, Mickey gives Mimi an ultimatum: Either the new boiler goes or he does. Mickey finds himself on The Jockey sofa.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Aidan's bad behaviour lands him in court. Patty will decide the outcome. Frank knows Aidan's worth too much to lose; problem is, Aidan knows it too.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Marty needs a job fast and turns to crime to tide him over. But he's not a smooth criminal, and using items borrowed from the Maguires wasn't smart.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Mimi might wear the trousers in the family, but it's time Billy pulled his weight. Kelly receives some shocking news during rehearsal.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Mickey catches Billy and Mimi in a compromising position. While Mimi is over the moon, Billy is bricking it as the Maguire brothers want his blood.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: In the opening episode of season 9 things aren't the same on the Chatsworth Estate as it's been abandoned by the Government and Council alike.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Now a fully qualified policeman Carl returns to the Chatswoth Estate but he'snot welcomed back with open arms by everyone.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Mimi worries that she can't be everything that Billy needs so proposes an open marriage which he reluctantly accepts.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: During a lads' night out, Micky is the victim of a gay bashing, leaving him mentally and physically scarred. Carl tries to persuade Mickey to let him track down his attacker and bring him to justice.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: A face from Jamie's past arrives in Chatsworth. DS Brooks, suspended on serious charges, needs Jamies help.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Desperate for cash, Jackson agrees to help Shane on a robbery job at a supermarket. however, the unlikely pair barely escape the security guards, and Jackson comes up with a scheme that may end poverty in Chatsworth altogether.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Thing's are getting worse for Kelly and Marty, Whilst Marty's grief for his lost children reaches breaking point, Kelly appears to be punishing herself for her recent miscarriage, enduring on a drink and drug binge.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Times are hard at the Gallaghers, and Marty's attempts to save money plunges the whole estate into darkness. the women gather at the Maguires, and shocking secrets are revealed, whilst Jamie agrees to hold a lock in for the men at the Jockey.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Chesney arrives home from hospital to find his cousin Toof waiting for him, who has been sent by Grandad to negotiate Chesney's future in Chatsworth. Lillian holds auditions for new staff at the brothel. Ruby makes an enemy out of Kelly.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: After a conversation with Frank, Jamie and Shane engineer a plan to raid Manchester's former War Rooms, now owned by the Lottery, with the aim of lifting a stash of scratch cards as a way to make some easy money.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Trapped underground, the preassure mounts for the five. Frank's life flashes before his eyes, with a particular event that occurred 35 years ago.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: The unthinkable has happened... the Department of Work and Pensions has finally caught up with job dodger Frank. He's a 'dead man walking' to... a job!
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Frank loves his new job at World of Burgers. His banter and laid-back approach wins the respect of the team and sales figures increase.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Marty befriends a Brazilian housemaid and determines to rescue her from her life of servitude.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Billy discovers a used pregnancy test after Mimi, Karen and Gloria spend the night boozing. He turns to Jamie for advice, and both of them set out to discover who's the daddy.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Consumed with guilt after the hit and run, Shane tries to makes amends by befriending Ruth, the widow of the man he killed.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Marty makes a life-changing decision and finds the nerve to propose to Kelly. Over the moon, she accepts.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Business is booming for Jackson and Shane, expansion is afoot and their future looks rosy. But when Jackson spots Shane giving leftover food to the homeless, all hell breaks loose.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: When Dom receives a cryptic text from an ex in desperation it prompts a crisis of faith and he turns to Frank for some major help.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Jamie must act swiftly to lay down the law and protect his family from gang threats, but it's not easy when the enemy are so well informed. Someone has to be passing the gang inside information, but who?
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: It's a big day for Mimi Maguire - it's her first wedding anniversary to Billy and they're going to renew their vows.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: It is a grand occasion as the Chatsworth inhabitants celebrate being awarded an Olympic ring from the London Games of 2012.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Jamie tries to contact his half brother Kassi, but after the punch-up in the Jockey, Kassi won't pick up the phone.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: When Lillian asks Kelly to free her savings from police surveillance, Kelly agrees for a cut of the stash, not realizing how much loot is at stake.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Kelly and Marty decide to spend their ill-gotten windfall on a new house, but when suspicions arise about their dirty money, all hell breaks loose.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Chesney has a rough day at work, but when an equipment breakdown sends him hunting for replacements, he meets Remona, a feisty Muslim pharmacist.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Aidan falls under pressure when the man he cares for as part of his community service suddenly dies, and Dom suspects he could be guilty of murder.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Romance blooms between Chesney and Mary Mae, but their feelings remain unexpressed -- until Letitia and Aiden decide to intervene.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: When Frank spots his son and granddaughter near the Chatsworth estate, he wonders if they have been living nearby all along and stages an encounter.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: When Frank finds a load of pills belonging to Tam at Esther's home, Esther tries to intervene, leading to unpleasant results at the Polish club dance.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Esther learns that her daughter's bullying resulted in Thalia's black eye and tries to set a good example by making amends with Chatsworth residents.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Patreesha envisions herself as Britain's new music sensation when her latest boyfriend promises her a lucrative singing career across the pond.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: The curtain is set to close on the reign of Chatsworth's very own Tony Montana, as Mimi's menopause triggers a tough period of transition.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: A wave of fear ripples through Chatsworth when there is a gunman on the loose, and it becomes apparent that his target is Frank.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: After nearly a decade of drama, debauchery, sex, drugs and anarchy, it comes time for the Chatsworth estate to throw one last party.
episodes.title: Episode 14
